title: 21st Century Fox 's revenue 2011 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 30.4 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 27.33 was reported at Year 2016
